item.title: How to change the description of the Stream in Liquidsoap
item.description: output.icecast( %mp3(bitrate=96), mount="/radio-96.mp3", genre="electronic", description="ITUnix Radio Electronic Music", name="ITUnix Radio", url="http://radio.itunix.eu", host="localhost", port=8147, password="PASSWORD", radio) example 2 output.icecast( %mp3(stereo=false, bitrate=16, samplerate=22050), host="audio3.radioreference.com", port = 80, password = "xxxxxxxxx", genre="Scanner", description="Scanner audio", mount="/xxxxxxxx", name="Baltimore Maryland Police/Fire/EMS", user="source", url="http://www.scanbaltimore.com", radio)
